Name: PRIMITIVE HEARTS
About the game: A lone wanderer returns to his hometown after years of traveling. A monster attack leads him to a hidden cave where he's told that the world is in danger... And he's the only one who can save it. Travel the land and fight off enemies in a race against time. Can you and your companions protect the Crystals from the Empire's nefarious plans? And what about the mysterious voice you keep hearing? How is it all connected? Level up, learn new abilities, and use the Job system to customize your party to gain an advantage against your enemies. Unlock different endings depending on which of the girls you decide to romance and the choices you make on your adventure. A Fantasy Role-Playing Game Level up and equip your heroes to overcome powerful enemies. A Varied Job System Pick which job suits your needs. Learn unique abilities to turn your party into monster-killing machines. A Large World to Explore Follow the main quest through many different lands and unlock side quests along the way.
